channel.title: Dan Harris
channel.description: Recent news about Dan Harris, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Here's a pic of the food trucks. I'm talking to you #Toronto. Who wants this kind of action in our great city? http://t.co/FzAUlnwSCW

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: We just walked into a happening good time at the shipyards in North Van. Foodtrucks galore. We need this in #Toronto http://t.co/eUbs87hPUl

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Hi @Canuck_2099 we are the e..e..e..e.. ewoks. Where's Wicket when you need him? Or maybe "Ketch" (if you've read X-Wing books) @starwars

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: #UhOh I married a tree-hugger! PM Harper would not be impressed and the Cons might call her a terrorist. I love it!!! http://t.co/3pajuo3IQ2

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: I feel like I'm in an ewok village! We're at the Capilano Suspension Bridge park in the treetop adventure! #Honeymoon http://t.co/7WOP7160oi
